parameters.name: AcceleratorIds
parameters.description:
The ID of the GA instance to be disassociated. You can specify up to 50 IDs.

If you leave this parameter empty, all GA instances associated with the specified domain name are disassociated.

parameters.name: Domain
parameters.description: The accelerated domain name to be disassociated.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the Global Accelerator (GA) instance is deployed. Set the value to **cn-hangzhou**.
